description: XSS challenge endpoint - Medium difficulty XSS injection challenge. Accepts 'name' parameter via GET method and applies regex filtering (blocks most HTML tags except <style>).
notes: Endpoint filters HTML tags but has a bypass: <style> tags are not filtered, allowing CSS-based injection. Calls check_xss() with PhantomJS to validate if XSS was successfully triggered. Returns 'Congratulations' message with flag if XSS detection succeeds. Accepts GET parameter 'name' with regex filtering pattern r'<(?!style\\b)[^>]+'> that blocks most HTML tags except style tags. Content-type: text/html; charset=utf-8.
